column1: length and skidding in at leg stump. Looks to flick it through square leg but doesn't make good enough connection

fuller this time, on middle stump. Steps out and looks to flick this to long-on. Once more, not connected too well. Taps it into his toe and Sundar is lazy as he stretches to his left. Feeble single down to long-on
good length, drifting in at middle, straightening a touch. Pushed aerially towards the bowler
nicely played. Sundar is going to skid them in, so you can hit through the line. That's exactly what Tharanga does. A bit of room, half stride, and taps the length ball over mid-off
back of a length at leg stump, pushed towards midwicket from the crease
good length at middle stump, leans in and pushes to midwicket off the inside half of the bat
back of a length, slight shape away from off stump. Watchfully dabbed into the point region with soft hands
back of a length and skidding into the thigh guard as he looks to tickle this fine, dribbles through square leg
short ball, very wide and swinging away. Past his attempted cut
nicely bowled. Gets this to rise in the corridor from short of a length. Steps out early and is forced to back away and try to carve this through point. Beaten
good length at off stump, a slower ball. Defended down the pitch

chips it straight to mid-on. There is a lot of bounce in this wicket right now. This one climbs from a good length at middle stump. Dickwella brings out his trademark pick-up shot on the rise, but it gets too big for him. Gets it off the high part of the bat and gets a goodbye kiss from the bowler
back of a length in the corridor, opens the face and runs it down to third man
full at off stump, pushes on the front foot and defends
arm ball, coming in at off stump from a good length. Opens the face and deflects this wide of short third man
full at off stump, driven back firmly at the bowler
100kph, length ball pushed through fast at leg stump. He looks to go inside-out but there isn't any turn. Squeezes into the leg side off the inside half
a much better shot to play against Sundar. Whips this with the angle from off stump, gets it wide of long-on...where Pandya has over-run this. Poor effort

got him! Looks to go with the angle again, but this time Sundar gets it to straighten. He's lunging forward to try and flick towards wide long-on again, but it's a leading edge that's taken easily by the bowler
back of a length, shaping away outside off. Slashes at it and misses
back of a length in the corridor, opens the face and runs this fine past the slip fielder. Kuldeep sprints to his right at third man and can't cut it off

holes out to deep square. Oh dear, what are we seeing here. A poor shot from Tharanga. Plays for line - it's on leg stump. But it's a cutter too. He's rolled his fingers over this length ball ad Tharanga's bat turns as he looks to whip if over midwicket
short ball, too quick for him. Looks to pull this off his chest, but can only bunt it off the sticker towards square leg
nearly chops it on. Back of a length and cramping him at off stump. He looks to steer it to third man and ends up dragging it wide of leg stump off the inside edge
misses the stumps again after an inside edge. Unadkat is getting it to zip at the batsmen. Gunaratne this time is late on the back foot defence
good length at off stump, shuffles and pokes it to deep midwicket
poor ball, well put away. Drops it short at middle stump, he stands tall and places the pull nicely to deep midwicket's right
good length at off stump, leans in on the front foot and pushes it down the pitch
shuffles a long way and sweeps a very full ball from middle stump. Straight to short fine
back of a length at off, shuffles and taps it into the open midwicket region
outside edge as he looks to cut. Hits some part of Dhoni - presumably glove - and flies past the slip fielder. This was quick off the pitch and cramped him for room
back of a length in the corridor, nicely timed square drive off the back foot. One-bounce towards Pandey at point who flies to his left and keeps it to one
shot. Steps out first ball, gets a touch cramped outside off but he manages to carve this on the up through cover
135kph, bouncer at middle stump. Gunaratne looks to ramp it over the keeper but this fizzes past
122kph, slower ball on a length at off stump. Plonks the front leg across and flicks to deep square
struck on the pad after walking down, but he's met this length ball well outside off. He was looking to whip this forecefully
classy. Always is, this guy. Length ball outside off, half-stride to get in line with this and then he caresses it on the up past mid-off
slower ball, short and wide outside off. Beaten by the change-up and can't get bat on the cut
short ball down leg side, gets too far under it with the hook and can't connect
length at off stump, pushes forward and flicks to midwicket
full at off stump, flicked to deep square
off the helmet and into the fine leg boundary. Sadeera struggling with the pull. Walks down at Pandya and gets a bouncer to ping him on the left side of the helmet. No physical damage to him
back of a length at middle stump, backs away to try and slice this through point. Can't get enough bat on it
full at middle stump, no feet as he swipes across the line. Gets it to deep square's right off the inside edge
good length and wide outside off. Can't connect as he looks to drive on the up
another stumping appeal against Gunaratne. It's how he's gone in the first two matches. Survives this one after being lulled on the front foot and beaten by a wrong'un
dropped by Dhoni. Another wrong'un, not picked. It's short at middle and he's still moving as he tries to back away and cut. Thick outside edge and Dhoni can't wrap his gloves around this
picks the gap. Steps out, meets it on the full outside off and clubs it past midwicket who is inside the circle
short ball, sliding away outside off. Chopped to sweeper cover
wrong'un, full outside off. Gunaratne goes well outside off, very early. Sweeps along the floor to deep backward square
full outside off, steps out and jams it into his pads. It trickles into the cover region
back of a length climber in the corridor. Arches a touch into the leg side and chops it to third man off the outside edge
short at the chest, pulled to fine leg
goes for the bouncer again, but he's dug it too short. It sails over the batsman, who, once again, was in no position to play this. Cramped and taking his eyes off

it was coming. Sadeera steps out and wants to clear mid-off, but this gets big on him. It's that kind of a pitch. Dug in hard at an off stump line. He offers the full face, but it takes the high end of the bat. Dinesh Karthik pedals backwards and pouches it
good length at middle stump, tickled to fine leg with a closed face
good length, wide outside off. Skids through low past the attempted slash
short ball angled across off stump, punched off the middle of the bat, straight to point
floated full outside off, walks across the stumps and flicks to deep square
full toss outside off, swept to deep square off the inside half
full at off stump, flicked expertly between long-on and deep midwicket
shot. Switches quickly to a left-hander's grip and gets under this length ball to swipe this over point
wrong'un, good length at off stump. Can't get this flick to beat the bowler in the midwicket area
full outside off, gets low and sweeps to deep backward square's left
full toss outside off, driven to long-off
back of a length at middle stump, punched straight to midwicket from the crease
short ball skids through low outside off, and past his attempted cut
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket's left
full and drifted into the pads, flicked to long leg
full at off stump, shuffles to flick to deep midwicket
dropped short at middle stump, miscues the pull and gets it to deep square's left
full ball at off stump, closes the face too early on the attempted flick and gets a leading edge into the covers
short ball outside off, spins and bounces past the attempted cut shot

finds deep midwicket with a well-connected slog sweep. Oh this sounded so good, but he's got no elevation at all. Picked up the full one from outside off and swatted it straight to Pandya at head height
good length, pushed through on leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket
wrong'un, short outside off. Cut to deep point
good length at off stump, plants the front leg across and flicks to deep square
short ball in the corridor, chopped to sweeper's right with great timing
slower ball, good length at middle stump. Leans in and is forced to adjust on the flick. Pushes it to midwicket
hammered past the non-striker. Siraj feeding it nicely in the slot, overpitched outside off. Perera nearly takes out his partner at the other end
top-edge lands between fine leg and deep square. No control on the attempted hook and then he's forced to run back hard as Iyer sends in a sensational throw on the bounce
chips it to midwicket. A tame dismissal. Overpitched slower ball on the pads, looks to clip it off his toe but picks out Rohit Sharma
wrong'un, good length at middle stump. Shuffles across and dabs this square into the leg side from the crease
floated up at off stump, flicked to long-on's right
tossed up on middle stump, deftly worked to deep square with the wrists
full at middle stump, driven to long-off

good length at middle stump, strikes him on the pad after he shuffles and looks to flick. Leg stump is visible. He doesn't get bat on it, the umpire says, as he signals leg-bye after turning down the lbw decision. They've reviewed it. That looks very close, but tracker says it's only clipping leg stump so that will be Umpire's Call.
wrong'un, short and turning away from off stump. Goes on the back foot and muscles this to long-on with a pull
short ball at off stump, hurried pull straight to midwicket
good length at off stump, squeezed to point's right with an open face
short ball fired way down leg side, no way of getting bat on that
slower ball at a length, coming in at off stump. Dropped in front of point with soft hands
beats the outside edge with one that straightens in the corridor. Shanaka plays for the angle, inside the line. He was also on the back foot to one that was full
slower ball, back of a length at middle stump. Tickled to fine leg
back of a length at leg stump, steered to fine leg with a swivel
back of a length at off stump, tapped to fine leg with the angle
good length outside off, leans in and runs it down to third man off the outside edge
back of a length at leg stump, flicked to fine leg
back of a length wide outside off, no feet as he stabs at this. Beaten
bouncer dug in too short and he lets it go
good length at off stump, defended into the covers on the front foot

oh beauty. Is it possible to hit over cover deliberately without looking elegant? This is an overpitched ball just outside off. He gets the front leg out of the way and swings cleanly under this with an open face and it's flat, over the extra cover boundary
slower ball, back of a length at off stump. Stands his ground and shovels to deep square
back of a length slower ball in the corridor, pushed to backward point with an open face
slower ball, short and wide outside off. Cut forcefully to sweeper's right
slower ball, grips in the pitch and climbs past the bat as he shapes for the cut outside off
offcutter, back of a length at off stump. Walks at it and looks to pull. Gets a top-edge that runs down to third man off the helmet
slower ball, good length, wide outside off. Gets down early to try and scoop it but this is so wide, he has to reach out for it. Can't get bat on it
back of a length at off stump, swings hard with the pull. Gets an inside edge onto thigh that rolls into the off side
short ball outside off. Backs away to try and slog this over midwicket. Beaten
offcutter, back of a length and climbing at off stump. Gets under this attempted pull and lobs it up for Kuldeep at midwicket, who has to jog a bit to his right
back of a length in the corridor. Whew. 144kph. Flies past the outside edge as he looks to run it down to third man
short ball in the corridor, chopped to third man with a half-leap
good length at middle stump, flicked on the up to mid-on
full at leg stump, flicked straight to midwicket
back of a length and cutting away from outside off. Slashes at it and is beaten on the outside edge
slower ball, good length at off stump. Dabbed into the point region with soft hands
slices it over Dhoni as he looks to sweep this offcutter from off stump. Goes a long way up, but it's too far for the keeper and short fine
slower ball, good length and down leg side. He skips into the leg side and swipes across the line. Beaten
slower ball, short and outside off. Punches it laboriously out to long-off
slower ball, lobbed full outisde off. Gets on the front foot and slogs it along the turf to long-on's left
top-edge over the keeper. Bouncer too quick for him, climbing rapidly at the chest. Closes his eyes and hoicks. Gets four
shot. He's beaten initially by the slower ball, but it's far too short to cause trouble. Adjusts as it sits up and flat-bats it over the bowler
short ball at leg stump, backs away and slices it out to long-on
oooooooooo that is massive! Top-tier, 103 metres from Shanaka. Stepped out at the length ball and slaughtered it with an old-fashioned heave over midwicket
steps out and crunches the full ball, gets it wide of long-off and that's two
the offbreak spins down the leg side, an extra to begin
better line, starts it wider outside off, lets the ball spin back, worked away towards square leg
this one doesn't turn that much, flat outside off, defended ably enough

the googly. Rohit doesn't pick it again. He has been dismissed to that so often to this same bowler already. Gets forward, the googly finds a big gap between bat and pad, but bounces over the stumps. How?
charges down and pushes the ball to long-on
the offbreak, flat around middle and leg, Rahul rocks back and pushes to long-on
just over the bowler's head? The googly again, outside off, Rohit comes down, gets to the pitch and drives back. Clears the bowler's leaping hands, mid-off cleans up
lovely delivery. Steams in and bowls a full length, gets just enough away shape to beat the outside edge. Not prodigious movement, but enough.
good length delivery around off and middle, Rahul goes back and defends with soft hands, played it late. His Test match technique and lessons will help him tremendously in situations like this
full and wide outside off, 138 kph, Rahul sees width and throws his hands at the ball, misses
full delivery around off, no swing. Watches it onto his bat and glides to third man with the open face. Quality shot
a tad wide, might want to bring that line closer to Rohit. Wide outside off, Rohit misses a cut.
good length outside off, 138 kph, punched to cover from the crease
offbreak, good length and dipping at middle stump. Lunges forward and pushes it to square leg's left
tossed up at off stump, he gets down very quickly and sweeps uppishly to deep midwicket's right. Was a topspinner
nicely bowled. Legbreak dips in towards leg stump and visibly has him in two minds. He respects it and defends in the end
gorgeous. Won't let him dictate. Length ball at off stump, steps out and meets the offbreak on the pitch and lifts it straight over mid-off
legbreak, tossed up at middle stump, flicked into the midwicket area
back of a length at off stump, punched to long-on
back of a length at off stump, tapped to short extra cover off the back foot

trapped in front of middle as he looks to whip this inswinger on the rise. He's given lbw and they've reviewed. 142 and moving rapidly, that one. Might be missing leg stump on line and height...or not. Tracker says it's clipping the top of leg stump so that will remain Umpire's Call. A wild heave from Rahul with the front foot plonked across off stump, was done by pace and movement
glorious shot. 140kph, full and into the pads. He holds his balance unlike Rahul, gets his eyes on top of this and flicks to the midwicket fence
short and wide outside off, left alone
back of a length at middle stump, defended into the leg side from the crease
short and wide outside off, slashes at it and misses. That bounce from the first innings still around
slapped away. Short and wide outside off, he doesn't get bounce like Chameera. Skids on nicely for the square drive on the up
lovely ball. Cuts in at his mid-riff and climbs over off stump from a good length outside off
back of a length at off, walks into the off side and flicks to deep square
good length in the corridor, defended into the covers
good length outside off, stabs at it with hard hands. Inside edge onto pad
slower ball, back of a length at leg stump. Cops it on the thigh guard as he looks to flick
good length outside off, leans in to the forward defence
back of a length in the corridor, transfers the weight into the off side and swats it aerially to the midwicket fence
good length at middle stump, stands tall this time and allows it to come to him. Flicks to perfection and beats fine leg by a long distance to his left
back of a length in the corridor, opens the face and guides it to third man
nicely done. Length ball outside off, pushes on the front leg and jabs this past extra cover
length at middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
back of a length at leg stump, deflected into the leg side off the thigh
back of a length outside off, looks to poke it to third man, beaten
back of a length at length at leg stump, defended into the leg side
back of a length at middle stump, defended to midwicket off the back foot
short ball at middle stump, swivels and pulls to deep square

holes out to deep square. Short ball at off stump, cuts in a touch and maybe climbs on him too, because he's really cramped as he shapes to pull. It's one-handed slice in the end and a simple catch i the deep
back of a length at middle stump, clipped to deep square
good length, in at leg stump. Flicks it hurriedly to fine leg
back of a length at middle stump, pushed late, with soft hands, to mid-on
back of a length in the corridor, steered to third man
clips the top of the pad, flies over the stumps and from under Dickwella. This skid through low from a length where we've seen deliveries climb earlier
good length at off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length slower ball on leg stump, shuffles across and deflects in fine leg's direction off the thigh guard
back of a length in the corridor, tapped to third man with an open face
good length outside off, tries to run it to third man off the face. Beaten
good length, in at middle stump. Tapped to midwicket
inside edge misses the stumps. Lines up and heaves across the line against this length ball outside off
back of a length in the corridor, guided to third man with a late cut
casually opens the face late against this short ball outside off, and it seems to be headed for a four down at third man, but Akila sprints and puts in a dive to stop it
chipped over the bowler off the toe-end. Length ball at middle, plants a half-stride and offers the full face
good length at off stump, opens the face and runs it to third man's right
back of a length at off stump, defended down the pitch
back of a length, climbing up sharply. Backs away and can't do more than tap this back at the bowler
back of a length, nipping in at off stump. Chops it, one-handed, to third man
good length at off stump, defended on the front foot
back of a length at middle stump, goes on the back foot and taps this to midwicket's right

dropped short on middle stump. Gets right back and uses a big flourish to pull from under the ball. Gets it out to deep midwicket's right and steals the second. Run-out shout is sent upstairs and shows he's comfortably in
back of a length at off stump, drops it in front of third man with soft hands
googly slides on, takes the inside edge as he lunges forward to defend. Bat and pad jammed close together. Appeal turned down
full at off stump, big stride forward to push to long-off
back of a length outside off, makes room and chops it to sweeper cover
full toss at middle stump, thumped past the non-striker and to long-on's left. Two runs
walks at the short ball and plays a stylish pull, straight to fine leg
good length outside off, expands his arms and slaps this hard. Straight to long-off
yorker outside off, squeezed out to point
sweeeeeeeet. Back-of-the-hand slower ball, loops and lands nicely outside off. Brings the bat down on it decisively to lift it flat and over the long-off boundary
full and dipping in at leg stump, flicks it uppishly towards deep midwicket
back of a length at leg stump, tucked off the pads to fine leg's left
length ball fired down leg side, forces Dickwella to put in a dive. And he does well
gets the angle in again, but gets it to straighten past the outside edge this time as he looks to dab it to third man
back of a length on leg stump, tapped past midwicket
goes for the bouncer, but it's too short and it's down leg side. Pandey ducks under it gratefully

short ball outside off, climbs on top of the bounce and slaps it on the rise to sweeper's right. Iyer says okay to a very risky second. Makes his ground but he's clutching his knee immediately after as he limps in the follow through
short ball outside off, mistimed cut goes to mid-off and he steals a single
Thisara puts in a stunning dive to his left to stop a back foot punch at extra cover. It was dropped short outside off and hit hard

run out off the bowler's fingertips at the non-striker's end. Iyer has just had a bit of treatment for his hamstring and immediately runs into some poor fortune after resumption. Another short ball, pummeled hard off the back foot but straight back at the stumps. Iyer is backing up a long way at the other end and Akila does smartly to get a touch on this with an outstretched right hand. He wasn't looking to stop that, it looked deliverate
tossed up at leg stump, driven to long-on
short at middle stump, shovelled to long-on's right

tossed up full at leg stump, powered down the ground with a drive. Very straight again but bisects the non-striker and stumps this time. Long-on does well to reach it to his left, but the parries it onto long-off's foot...which deflects it into the boundary
length outside off, reaches out and drives straight to extra cover
length outside off, walks at it and drives to long-off
classic Pandey. Short ball, a slower one, climbs up at his mid-riff and he walks into this and carts it past midwicket on the up, with the trailing leg lifted high in pride
midwicket is still in, and he hits another one past him. This one a lot easier. Knee-height full toss at off stump, slogged along the turf to long-on's right
short ball outside off, pulled to long-on
classy drive out to sweeper's right after walking down at another length ball. Slices it with great timing

guides one to the keeper and screams some expletives around the mic that will probably earn him demerit points. To be fair, it was a shot that merits such a reaction. Short ball outside off, easy put away for someone like him. He's too laid-back on the attempted ramp, and gets a very thin connection on it. It all looks pre-match practice, that sequence of play
short ball outside off, punched to long-off's left
gorgeous cover drive on the up, but straight to extra cover on the bounce. Length ball outside off and he leans into it
slower ball, good length and in at leg stump. Leans into it and tucks it to fine leg's left
good length at middle stump, flicks it straight to midwicket who parries it to the right and allows the single
oh he's in now. What a sound of the bat. Back of a length ball outside off. Gets well leg side of it and flays it hard. Sweeper has no chance
good length at off stump, punched down the ground to long-off
misses a straight one. Chameera has been dipping it in at the stumps for the entirety of his spell. Another one. Comes in from a length, tonks middle stump as he looks to punch through the off side
back of a length at off stump, walks across into the off side and dabs it behind square on the leg side
inswinger, good length at middle. Punched gracefully on the up to long-on

outside edge just evades Dickwella! Chameera has bowled superbly tonight. Gets this to move away in the corridor. Dhoni stays stuck to the crease and stabs at it. Big edge, no slip. Dickwella's reach is only that wide
short ball outside off, gets closer this time and is more watchful as he nudges this to sweeper's right

review for lbw after Nitin Menon turns this down. Dhoni was rooted to the crease as this inswinger strikes him in front of middle stump...no bat. And tracker says this is climbing above the stumps. He was looking to flick, standing slightly on his toes
length ball at middle, skips down the track and flicks it to deep square
full and outside off, gets to the pitch and taps it to long-off
short ball in the corridor, chopped with great timing but Shanaka puts in a big leap to his left at point to save the boundary
full at off stump, eagerly reaching out for this, driven to long-off
short in the corridor, sliced to third man
short ball at off stump, walks into it and looks to shovel this behind square leg. Cops it on the body
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper off the back foot
back of a length outside off, looks to drag it past midwicket with a closed face and ends up lobbing it back towards the non-striker
good length outside off, gets the front leg out of the way and swings across the line like a rebel teenager who isn't happy with his coach. Gets it to deep square's left
narrowly misses leg stump as Karthik falls into the off side to try and ramp this length ball over short fine
swings across the line, midwicket is i, but he's not connected well enough to find the boundary. Length ball tailing in from outside off, and he'll be a little disappointed. Hard hands as it came in

butchered over square leg. That should be that. A knee-height full toss at middle stump, he merely has to get his front leg out of the way and swing his natural swing. Gets it neatly out of the middle and it goes a long way into the crowd
good length outside off, drags it to long-on...whose throw hits the stumps, deflects into the off side and allows Dhoni to take strike for yet another finishing moment
miscued yorker, is a low full toss on middle stump. He leans in and flicks the wrists to place it between fine leg and deep midwicket to bring up the win
